name: Lofi Checkers
description:
Lofi Checkers is a cozy version of a classic game when you have a moment to spare. Relax, chill, and enjoy the simplicity of a game which is so universally known and liked.

This game includes custom made soundtracks in the style of lofi beats you'd hear on YouTube. If you're studying, this is a good way to relax for a moment rather than get lost in social media or a gaming binge.

Featured are a variety of lofi backgrounds to feel a chill ambience while playing a game or two.
